Method Detail

createLoadingPlan

public LoadingResult createLoadingPlan(TourTransport[] shippingOrders,
                                       ContainerType[] containerTypes)
Description copied from interface: IntegralPacker
Tries to load the packages specified by the transports into the specified container.

Specified by:
createLoadingPlan in interface IntegralPacker
Parameters:
shippingOrders - Defines the packages together with their loading and unloading locations. The array is primarily sorted by ascending loading locations and a secondarily by ascending unloading locations. The locations are numbered consecutively along the route beginning with zero for the first loading location.
containerTypes - The types of the containers into which the packages are to be loaded. The index into this array is used to identify the container in the loading plan, see Package.getContainerIndex().
Returns:
null on failure or the result containing the new loading plan on success.
